# node-swiz

node-swiz is a [node.js](http://nodejs.org) serialization and validation
framework intended to be used with RESTful APIs which commonly use XML and
JSON as transports.

# Installation

`npm install swiz`

# Tutorial and intro

[node-swiz â€“ Node.js Library For Serializing, Deserializing And Validating Objects In REST APIs](http://www.rackspace.com/blog/node-swiz-node-js-library-for-serializing-deserializing-and-validating-objects-in-rest-apis/)
    
# Running tests

`npm run-script test`
